sentences.sContent: His blood, by the logic of the time, needed cooling.
sentences.sContent_eng: His blood, by the logic of the time, needed cooling.
sentences.sCn: 用当时的逻辑来说，他的血需要冷却一下。

sentences.sContent: Imagine an environment that does not need cooling at all!
sentences.sContent_eng: Imagine an environment that does not need cooling at all!
sentences.sCn: 想像一下吧，这样的环境根本不需要冷却了！

sentences.sContent: Then you have, in terms of the barrier integrity, reactor cooling systems activity, cladding failure.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then you have, in terms of the barrier integrity, reactor cooling systems activity, cladding failure.
sentences.sCn: 然后你们会有，在屏障完整性，反应堆冷却系统行为，覆盖层失效。

phrases.pCn: 冷却速度；冷却速率；散热速率
冷却，降温；缓和运动；结束活动
